attributes.title: very bad!

attributes.title: Homophobic
attributes.review: Uhm when I logged in and entered my name suddenly its "Hi F*g" and "Send me your location f*g" like..cant catch a break. Anyway, the app is hella hard to navigate and super confusing. The spinning "T" makes me dizzy and could lead to me passing out, this app is dangerous. Not to mention it's labeled as "news" when it's so clearly FAKE news. This is PROPAGANDA. I don't know why there's this Oompa Loompa giving me a thumbs up but I don't like it. I love POC, but he's not one of them.

attributes.title: UNRELIABLE!! SPAM!! POOR FUNCTIONING!!

The app itself is slow with poor functionality and doesn‚Äôt even have a lot of good resources. Very disappointed. 100% would NOT recommend!
